price: 69. Ik heb geen kennis van de Verheven vooraanstaanden (de Engelen), wanneer zij redetwisten en discussiëren.
arabic: مَا كَانَ لِيَ مِنۡ عِلۡمِۭ بِٱلۡمَلَإِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰٓ إِذۡ يَخۡتَصِمُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: mā kāna liya min ʿil'min bil-mala-i al-aʿlā idh yakhtaṣimūna
